Articles.Content:
Hello from Antwerp,

I just made an account, been lurking a while.

I use KSP on Debian Linux, 64-bit... with issues, but that is for another thread.

cheers,

paul

PS Steam claims I played KSP for 5 minutes, but the reality is closer to 150 hours.

hello!

antwerp is such a funny name for a place.

64x is still very buggy, so Issues are expected

welcome!
